lines.text: What if... they dunked the bullet in concrete, to slow it down?
What if they dunked the bullet in concrete.
What if... they saw the gun reflected in the tub, so they could react faster?
What if they saw the reflection of the bullet right in front of 'em.
What if... they drank the concrete as a potion, which made them faster somehow?
What if wet concrete mix was a performance-enchancing drug.
What if... they cemented their position as the world's fastest old men?
